appsGate.lig.manager.client.communication
Class ClientCommunicationManager

java.lang.Object
  org.java_websocket.WebSocketAdapter
      org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
          appsGate.lig.manager.client.communication.ClientCommunicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
SendWebsocketsService, ListenerService, java.lang.Runnable, org.java_websocket.WebSocketListener
public class ClientCommunicationManager
extends org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
implements ListenerService, SendWebsocketsService

This class is the manager for all web sockets connections. All external applications will communicate with ApAM components through an instance of this class.

Since:
February 8, 2013
Version:
1.1.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
ListenerService, SendWebsocketsService
